column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I don't know what they do to their crust but it is soooo friggin good. Thick crust
column2: think crust...I love it. Just give me the crust and I'll be good. Okay
column3: so maybe I need more then the crust but mmmmm
column4: soo good! It's just a toss up for me as to which is better....think it just depends on what I'm in the mood for. Oh the thing I don't like is if you ask for extra sausage they end up putting a sausage patty across the entire pizza which I am not a fan of. I want my sausage crumbled not in huge patty form...that's just weird...or maybe I'm weird...whatever. To each his own.
